onBoarding.sliderDescription2: 20+ trusted brands and over 2,000+ energy products. Discover the best power solution for your needs with easy support and return options.
onBoarding.sliderDescription3: Latest solar systems, power backups and water pumps every week. Premium quality. Fast delivery available. Hassle-free installation and secure service.

helpCenter.content: Please get in touch and we will be happy to help you. Get quick customer support by selecting your item
helpCenter.question1: How do I place an order on the app?
helpCenter.question1Answer: To place an order, simply browse through our product catalog, select the items you want, add them to your cart, and proceed to checkout to confirm your order.
helpCenter.question2: Can I view product details, such as specifications and availability?
helpCenter.question2Answer: Yes, you can view detailed product information including specifications, availability, and customer reviews. Simply navigate to the product page within the app.
helpCenter.question3: What should I do if I need to cancel or modify an order?
helpCenter.question3Answer: To cancel or modify an order, go to the "My Orders" section, find your order, and follow the provided options to make changes.
helpCenter.question4: How can I find products from specific categories or brands?
helpCenter.question4Answer: You can use the app‚Äôs search filters to find products from specific categories or brands. Filter results by categories such as electronics or clothing.
helpCenter.question5: Is there a way to make payments for orders within the app?
helpCenter.question5Answer: Yes, you can securely make payments for orders using various payment methods available in the app, including credit/debit cards and digital wallets.
helpCenter.question6: Are my personal details and order information kept secure?
helpCenter.question6Answer: Yes, we prioritize the security and confidentiality of your personal details and order information. Our app complies with strict privacy and data protection standards.
helpCenter.question7: Can I request assistance with special product requirements or preferences?
helpCenter.question7Answer: Yes, you can request assistance with special product requirements or preferences during the ordering process. Simply specify your preferences, and we'll do our best to accommodate them.
helpCenter.question8: Is customer support available through this app?
helpCenter.question8Answer: While we facilitate online shopping, our app is not for customer support. For assistance, please contact our support team through the designated channels provided in the app.

termsCondition.termsCondition: Terms and Conditions for NBS Groups
termsCondition.introContent: By accessing or placing an order with NBS Group, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
termsCondition.section1Content:
NBS Group 

Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

üìß sales@nbsgroups.com | üìû +971 4 2243543
section2List: All orders are subject to availability and acceptance.
Prices listed are in AED (or local currency) and may include applicable taxes.
Payments must be made in full before shipping unless otherwise agreed.
section3List: Delivery timelines may vary depending on product availability and location.
We are not responsible for delays caused by courier services or unforeseen circumstances.
Customers must provide accurate shipping information to avoid delays.
section4List: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours if not yet shipped.
Returns are accepted within 7 days for eligible items. See our Refund & Cancellation Policy for details.
section5List: Products are covered under manufacturer warranty (if applicable).
Warranty does not cover misuse, improper installation, or unauthorized repairs.
section6List: You agree not to misuse our website or attempt unauthorized access.
Content on the website (text, images, etc.) is property of NBS Group and may not be copied without permission.

section7List.title: NBS Group is not liable for:
items: Damages resulting from improper product use or installation.

section8List: These terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes will be resolved under Dubai jurisdiction.
termsCondition.section9Content: NBS Group reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Updated terms will be posted on our website with the effective date.
termsCondition.section10Content: For any questions regarding these terms, contact:

section10List.address: Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

deliveryPolicy.title: Delivery Policy
deliveryPolicy.intro: At NBS Group, we are committed to ensuring your orders are delivered promptly, securely, and with full transparency. This Delivery Policy outlines how we process, ship, and deliver orders to our customers in the United Arab Emirates and internationally.

section1.title: 1. Delivery Coverage
section1.domestic: All Emirates within the UAE (Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Umm Al Quwain, Ras Al Khaimah, Fujairah).
section1.international: Selected countries worldwide (please contact our support team for availability before placing an order).

section2.title: 2. Processing Time
section2.point1: Orders are processed within 1‚Äì2 business days after payment confirmation.
section2.point2: Orders placed on weekends or UAE public holidays will be processed on the next working day.

section3.title: 3. Delivery Methods & Timelines
section3.intro: We use trusted courier partners to ensure safe and timely delivery. Estimated delivery times are:
section3.note: *Please note: Delivery timelines may vary depending on location, customs clearance, and unforeseen circumstances.*

section4.title: 4. Order Tracking
section4.description: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive:
section4.point2: A link to track your shipment in real-time.

section5.title: 5. Delivery Delays
section5.description: While we strive to deliver within the estimated timeframes, delays may occur due to:
section5.point1: Incorrect or incomplete delivery details provided by the customer.
section5.point2: Weather conditions, customs checks, or unforeseen logistical issues.
section5.note: In such cases, NBS Group will work closely with our delivery partners to resolve the issue promptly.

section6.title: 6. Delivery Address
section6.point1: Please ensure your shipping address is accurate and complete before placing an order.
section6.point2: Any changes after dispatch are subject to courier approval and may incur additional charges.

section7.title: 7. Missed Deliveries
section7.point1: If a delivery attempt is missed, the courier will attempt redelivery or contact you to reschedule.
section7.point2: Orders unclaimed within 5 days may be returned to us, and additional shipping charges may apply for resending.

section8.title: 8. Damaged or Missing Items
section8.description: If your order arrives damaged or incomplete:
section8.point1: Report the issue to sales@nbsgroups.com within 48 hours of delivery.
section8.point2: Provide photos of the damaged package/items for quicker resolution.
section8.point3: We will arrange for replacement, exchange, or refund as per our Return & Refund Policy.

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.address: üè¢  Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

deliveryPolicy.footer: values your trust and is committed to delivering your orders with care and reliability.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At NBS Group, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.
section1List: Name, email address, phone number, and shipping/billing address
Device and browser information (for website usage analytics)
section2List: Communicate order updates and customer support
Improve our website, products, and services
Send promotional updates (only if you opt in)
privacyPolicy.section3Content: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure. Your information is never sold or shared with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
privacyPolicy.section4Content: Our website may use cookies to enhance user experience. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.section5Content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time by contacting us.
privacyPolicy.section6Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us:

section6List.address: Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

refundAndCancellationPolicy.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
refundAndCancellationPolicy.intro: At NBS Group, we are committed to customer satisfaction and transparent service.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section1Content: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours if not yet shipped. For custom or bulk orders, cancellation is not allowed once confirmed.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section2Content: Returns are accepted within 7 days of delivery for unused, uninstalled items in original packaging. Non-returnable items include customized products, opened electrical components, and items marked ‚ÄúFinal Sale.‚Äù Return shipping is the customer's responsibility unless the product is defective or incorrect.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section3List: Contact us within 3 days of delivery for a free replacement or full refund if the item is damaged, faulty, or incorrect.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section4Content: Approved refunds will be processed within 7‚Äì10 business days to the original payment method.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section5Content: Subject to availability. Return and re-shipping costs may apply.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section6Content: For all return, refund, or cancellation requests:

section6List.address: Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.
